name: cuttlebone
description: ukagaka shell renderer for web browser

scripts._build: rm -rf output/*; rm -rf lib/*; npm run build-coffee; npm run build-src; npm run build-test; npm run concat-src; npm run espower; npm run plato;
scripts._espower: for i in `find output/test -name test*.js`; do node node_modules/espower-cli/bin/cmd.js $i > $i.esp.js; done
scripts._concat-src: cat output/coffee/header.js output/coffee/NamedManager.js output/coffee/Named.js output/coffee/Scope.js output/coffee/Balloon.js output/coffee/BalloonSurface.js output/src/Shell.js output/src/Surface.js output/src/SurfaceUtil.js output/src/SurfaceRender.js output/coffee/footer.js > lib/cuttlebone.js
scripts.plato: node node_modules/plato/bin/plato --title cuttlebone --jshint .jshintrc --recurse --dir report --exclude output/test/ output
scripts.update: npm update; bower update; tsd update --save --overwrite
scripts.init: npm run update; npm run build

author: Ikagaka
